kwb.nextcloud 0.4.0.9000
  • Reference
    • Tutorial
  • Changelog

R package to access file infos or download data from an Nextcloud instance using the WebDav API (https://docs.nextcloud.com/server/17/developer_manual/client_apis/WebDAV/).

Installation

For installing the latest release of this R package run the following code below:

# Enable repository from kwb-r
options(repos = c(
  kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',
  CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))
  
# Download and install kwb.nextcloud in R
install.packages('kwb.nextcloud')

# Browse the kwb.nextcloud manual pages
help(package = 'kwb.nextcloud')
